title: Natasha Lyonne’s Claps Are Expressive and Radiant
text:
Photo: Fox

So you get up on the Emmys stage, and you’re looking into the bright lights and wondering how on Earth you can possibly give a speech about your gratitude for winning this award. Your mind is blank. But then you look into the audience, and there — there! — like a beacon of hope, there is Natasha Lyonne, and she is clapping for you. Suddenly everything will be all right!

Natasha Lyonne’s claps are variable and lovely. They are expressive. They are solar powered. They are radiant. We are lucky to have been in their presence. Please enjoy some varietals below.
description: At the 2019 Emmy Awards Russian Doll nominee Natasha Lyonne demonstrated a variety of clapping methods.
